form.forgotPasswordDescription: Enter your email address below and if your account is active, we'll send you a password reset link.

login.min: Login must be at least 3 characters long
login.max: Login must be at most 36 characters long

password.min: Pasword must be at least 8 characters long
password.max: Password must be at most 32 characters long

confirmPassword.min: Pasword must be at least 8 characters long
confirmPassword.max: Password must be at most 32 characters long

waitForVerifyPage.description: Wait for verification. We'll send you an email.
waitForVerifyPage.toastSuccess: The verification link has been resent.
waitForVerifyPage.toastError: An error occurred while resending verification link.

verifyAccountPage.toastError: Account verification error. The token is inactive.

acceptEmailPage.toastError: Email accepting error. The token is inactive.

editAccountDetailsPage.description: Here you can change your email, password or personal data

resendAcceptMail.modalBody: Please open your mailbox and accept email edit by link

email.min: Email must be at least 5 characters long
email.max: Email must be at most 320 characters long

firstName.min: First name must be at least 2 characters long
firstName.max: First name must be at most 50 characters long
firstName.syntax: First name can contain only letters

lastName.min: Last name must be at least 2 characters long
lastName.max: Last name must be at most 50 characters long
lastName.syntax: Last name can contain only letters and character: -

phoneNumber.min: Phone number must be at least 8 digits long
phoneNumber.max: Phone number must be at most 9 digits long
phoneNumber.syntax: Phone number can contain only digits

manageUsersPage.description: Here you can add new users or edit existing ones.

verifyUsersFMPage.description: Here you can accept or remove users.

apiError.accountWithPhoneNumberExist: Account with the given phone number already exists, select another one
apiError.accountWithEmailExist: Account with the given email already exists, select another one
apiError.accountWithLoginExist: An account with this login already exists, please choose a different one
apiError.accessDenied: You don't have access to this resource
apiError.permissionsAlreadyAdded: You can not modify this role
apiError.identicalPasswords: Old and new password can not be identical
apiError.searchPreferencesNotFound: An account with these data does not exist
apiError.notAuthorized: You are not authorized to perform this operation
apiError.authenticationError: Authentication error, please check your credentials
apiError.optimisticLock: Failed to update data. It appears that they have been modified by another user.

validation.emailInvalidSize: invalid email size: minimal 5 characters and maximal 320 characters
validation.firstNameInvalidSize: Invalid first name: minimal 2 characters and maximal 50 characters
validation.firstNameInvalidPattern: First name must contain only letters
validation.passwordHashInvalidSize: Invalid password hash: must consist of exactly 60 characters
validation.lastNameInvalidSize: Invalid last name size: minimal 2 characters and maximal 50 characters
validation.lastNameInvalidPattern: Invalid last name pattern: must contain only letters and character: -
validation.loginInvalidSize: Invalid login size: minimal 3 characters and maximal 36 characters
validation.loginInvalidPattern: Invalid login pattern: must only contain letters, characters and numbers
validation.orderInvalidPattern: Invalid order pattern: can be either 'asc' or 'desc'
validation.permissionInvalidPattern: Invalid permission pattern: can be only administrator, facility manager or owner
validation.phoneNumberInvalidSize: Invalid phone number size: minimal 8 characters and maximal 9 characters
validation.phoneNumberInvalidPattern: Invalid phone number: must contain only numbers

alert.emailSent: An email has been sent to your email address. Please check your inbox.

header.title: Reset password
header.description: Fill the form below to reset your password.

alert.passwordReseted: Password reseted succesfully. You will be redirected to the login page in a moment.

changePassword.description: Fill the form below to change your password.
changePassword.success: Your password has been changed successfully

popup.msg: Are you sure you want to:

headers.description: Here you can see user's details.

editPasswordByAdminDialog.description: Fill the form below to change user's password
editPasswordByAdminDialog.success: The password has been changed and the user has been informed by e-mail about the possibility of changing the password

twoFactor.description: To log in enter the two factor code from your email
